news.title: MTU Cork School of Music Percussion Ensemble release debut album Glioscarnach
news.summary: The record comes out on December 6.

news.title: KNEECAP announce official Dublin afterparty at Index
news.summary: Their latest single 'No Comment' was released last month.

news.title: Björk teases new album in Reykjavik exhibition announcement
news.summary: A newly announced exhibition in Reykjavik next summer features work from an album that is currently "under development".

news.title: WATCH: Trailer released for 28 Years Later: The Bone Temple
news.summary: The new film comes out January 14.

news.summary: Here are some highlights from the 2025 Hot Press Gift Guide...

news.title: Trailer released for Taylor Swift’s Eras Tour concert film
news.summary: The full concert will premiere on Disney+ on December 12.

news.title: Sabrina Carpenter calls out Trump for using her music in ICE promotion: "evil and disgusting"
news.summary: Other artists such as Olivia Rodrigo have similarly called out the Trump administration for using their music without permission.

news.title: Elaine Mai: "I definitely found a sense of community when I first moved to Dublin"
news.summary: Electronic musician Elaine Mai discusses her fantastic new album For Us, and the LGBTQ+ spaces where she finds community in Dublin.

news.title: 60 years ago today: The Beatles released Rubber Soul
news.summary: On this day 60 years ago, The Beatles released their sixth studio album, Rubber Soul – arriving just four months after the release of their previous LP, Help! A hugely influential project, Rubber Soul has since been listed among the greatest albums of all time...
